entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:53 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
